member.name: T:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel
member.summary: Provides support for parallel loops and regions.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.For(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Action{System.Int32})
member.summary: Executes a for loop in which iterations may run in parallel.
member.returns: A structure that contains information on what portion of the loop completed.
member.param: The start index, inclusive.
The end index, exclusive.
The delegate that is invoked once per iteration.
member.exception: The exception that is thrown when the argument is null.
The exception that contains all the individual exceptions thrown on all threads.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.For(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Action{System.Int32,System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState})
member.summary: Executes a for loop in which iterations may run in parallel and the state of the loop can be monitored and manipulated.
member.returns: A structure that contains information on what portion of the loop completed.
member.param: The start index, inclusive.
The end index, exclusive.
The delegate that is invoked once per iteration.
member.exception: The exception that is thrown when the argument is null.
The exception that contains all the individual exceptions thrown on all threads.

member.name: T:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopResult
member.summary: Provides completion status on the execution of a loop.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopResult.IsCompleted
member.summary: Gets whether the loop ran to completion, such that all iterations of the loop were executed and the loop didn't receive a request to end prematurely.
member.returns: true if the loop ran to completion; otherwise false;

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopResult.LowestBreakIteration
member.summary: Gets the index of the lowest iteration from which was called.
member.returns: Returns an integer that represents the lowest iteration from which the Break statement was called.

member.name: T:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState
member.summary: Enables iterations of loops to interact with other iterations. An instance of this class is provided by the Parallel class to each loop; you can not create instances in your user code.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.Break
member.summary: Communicates that the loop should cease execution at the system's earliest convenience of iterations beyond the current iteration.
member.exception: The method was previously called. and may not be used in combination by iterations of the same loop.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.IsExceptional
member.summary: Gets whether any iteration of the loop has thrown an exception that went unhandled by that iteration.
member.returns: True if an unhandled exception was thrown; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.IsStopped
member.summary: Gets whether any iteration of the loop has called .
member.returns: true if any iteration has stopped the loop; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.LowestBreakIteration
member.summary: Gets the lowest iteration of the loop from which was called.
member.returns: An integer that represents the lowest iteration from which Break was called. In the case of a loop, the value is based on an internally-generated index.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.ShouldExitCurrentIteration
member.summary: Gets whether the current iteration of the loop should exit based on requests made by this or other iterations.
member.returns: true if the current iteration should exit; otherwise false.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.Stop
member.summary: Communicates that the loop should cease execution at the system's earliest convenience.
member.exception: The method was previously called. and may not be used in combination by iterations of the same loop.

member.name: T:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelOptions
member.summary: Stores options that configure the operation of methods on the class.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelOptions.CancellationToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the associated with this instance.
member.returns: The token that is associated with this instance.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelOptions.MaxDegreeOfParallelism
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum degree of parallelism enabled by this ParallelOptions instance.
member.returns: An integer that represents the maximum degree of parallelism.
member.exception: The exception that is thrown when this is set to 0 or some value less than -1.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelOptions.TaskScheduler
member.summary: Gets or sets the associated with this instance. Setting this property to null indicates that the current scheduler should be used.
member.returns: The task scheduler that is associated with this instance.
